name: JAK1
description: Also known as JAK1_HUMAN, JAK1, JAK1A, JAK1B. Tyrosine kinase of the non-receptor type, involved in the IFN-alpha/beta/gamma signal pathway (PubMed:7615558). Kinase partner for the interleukin (IL)-2 receptor (PubMed:11909529) as well as interleukin (IL)-10 receptor (PubMed:12133952). Interacts with IL31RA (PubMed:15194700). Interacts with IFNAR2 (PubMed:7759950). Interacts with IFNGR1 (PubMed:7615558). Interacts with JAKMIP1 (PubMed:15277531). Interacts with SHB (PubMed:12200137). Interacts (via N-terminus) with IL2RB and IL10RA (via its cytoplasmic domain) (PubMed:12133952). Interacts with FER.
